about_the_game: Is Israel a greater world threat than Iran...a state bordering on the edge of Nazi Fascism? Boycott This! examines the ridiculous claims against the world’s only Jewish state using satire and humor as conservative comedian, Brad Stine, leads the viewer through a minefield of hate to find the truth. The film aims to logically examine the BDS agenda... it’s origins, it’s basis and it’s leaders. The film includes various celebrities and experts including Dennis Prager, Pastor Jack Hayford, Alan Dershowitz, Isi Liebler, Roger Simon, Jackie Mason and many others.
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Is Israel a greater world threat than Iran...a state bordering on the edge of Nazi Fascism? Boycott This! examines the ridiculous claims against the world’s only Jewish state using satire and humor as conservative comedian, Brad Stine, leads the viewer through a minefield of hate to find the truth. The film aims to logically examine the BDS agenda... it’s origins, it’s basis and it’s leaders. The film includes various celebrities and experts including Dennis Prager, Pastor Jack Hayford, Alan Dershowitz, Isi Liebler, Roger Simon, Jackie Mason and many others.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
